title: Place of birth
description: The place where a person was born. A town (in the `address` field) and `country` may be sufficient information. This MUST only apply to the `placeOfBirth` field for natural persons.

title: Residential address
description: An address where someone lives. This MUST only apply to natural persons.

title: Registered address
description: An official address for delivering statutory mail and legal notices which must be provided to company registers. This MUST only apply to entities.

title: Service address
description: An address which can be used as an alternative to a residential address for the purpose of receiving post. This MUST only apply to natural persons.

title: Alternative address
description: An address provided in addition to the primary address for this entity or person that is neither a service nor a registered address.

title: Business address
description: A place where the entity conducts its business.
